data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Nugaal, Somalia. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nugaal, Somalia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Nugaal, Somalia know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 6936 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Nugaal.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 11 believers in Nugaal, Somalia how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Mushunguli people. Make the Mushunguli people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Nugaal to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 76,300 citizens of the the state of Nugaal.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Nugaal.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

location.name: Nugaal
location.people_groups_list: Mahra, Oromo, Southern, Baloch, Southern, Deaf, Rahanweyn
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Mahra (4,200), Oromo, Southern (88,000), Baloch, Southern (9,400), Deaf (159,000), Rahanweyn (2,016,000)
